    • Method Detail

      • findAllBugReports

        public java.util.List<BugReport> findAllBugReports()
        Returns All the BugReport objects on Database.

        This method returns all existing BugReports from the database.

        Returns:
        BugReport ArrayList of all BugReports that are in the Database.

      • findById

        public BugReport findById(int id)
        Returns a BugReport object from the database that matches the id.

        This method returns a BugReport object from the database that has the matching id entered into the method parameter.

        Parameters:
        id - id of the BugReport that will be returned from the database
        Returns:
        BugReport that matches id parameter

      • saveBugReport

        public boolean saveBugReport(BugReport bugReport)
        Checks if a BugReport has a Null value and if it is not null and is Present returns a boolean based on this check.

        This method saves a new BugReport to the database, it checks if the values are null and if it passes it will save the new report to the database.

        Parameters:
        bugReport - the BugReport that will be checked for in the database.
        Returns:
        result of check if the BugReport is present it will return true

      • updateBugReportStatus

        public void updateBugReportStatus(BugReport bugReport)
        Updates a BugReport Status on the database.

        This method deletes a BugReport from the database that has an id that matches the inputed parameter.

        Parameters:
        bugReport - BugReport to be updated

      • deleteBugReport

        public void deleteBugReport(int id)
        Deletes a BugReport from the database.

        This method deletes a BugReport from the database that has an id that matches the inputed parameter.

        Parameters:
        id - int value used to find the report in the database and delete it

      • sumBugReport

        public int sumBugReport(int id)
        Returns an int for the total value of a BugReport.

        This method calls the BugReportRepository to find a BugReport and calculate the total point value the completed BugReport is worth. It does this by calculating the severity of the problem using calculateSeverityPoints(), the time it took to solve that problem using calculateTimePoints(), adding them together and returning the value as an int.

        Parameters:
        id - int value used to find the report in the database and use that BugReport to calculate the return value
        Returns:
        static int value obtained from adding the number of days the BugReport was needed to solve and the severity value.

      • calculateSeverityPoints

        public int calculateSeverityPoints(BugReport br)
        Calculates the Severity of a problem into an int for sumBugReport.

        This method takes in a BugReport parameter br, taking the the string value of severity, it returns a value based on the already established criteria from low to critical. If there was no value or an imporper string the method returns 0.

        Parameters:
        br - BugReport object used to get the severity
        Returns:
        static int value based on severity string, low - 5, med - 15, high - 25, critical - 50, else it will return 0

      • resolve

        public boolean resolve(int id,
                       java.lang.String username)
        Updates the users current score when a new report is submitted.

        This method is used after a new BugReport is submitted, using id parameter to identify the bug report to be calculated and the sum of the points from the report are calculated, with that value it adds it to the user with username that equals username parameter.

        Parameters:
        id - id for BugReport object used for getting sum value
        username - username of User to be used to calculate new score
        Returns:
        returns false if report is null or if the bug was already resolved. otherwise the BugReport is updated and method returns true

      • calculateTimePoints

        public int calculateTimePoints(BugReport bugReportToCheck)
        Returns an int equaling the time bonus points of a resolved bug, one point per day since submission.

        This method gets a Calendar object to find out the current day, finds out the number of days that have passed between the bugs submission date and the current day. Then cast that as an int which represents the number of points to return. Right now one point is rewarded per day.

        Parameters:
        bugReportToCheck - a bug report that has just been resolved. It will use it's submit date.
        Returns:
        an int equaling the point value of a resolved bug time bonus.

      • findByStatus

        public java.util.List<BugReport> findByStatus(java.lang.String status)
        Returns a list of bug reports based on status

        This method takes a string input to search and return all reports who's Status value match the status parameter in an ArrayList. Additionally, the method sets the password to null to prevent user from seeing other users password

        Parameters:
        status - Status value of BugReports to be returned, if it does not exist returns nothing
        Returns:
        Arraylist of Bugreports that Status value match parameter
